alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Mobile (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 3:36AM CDT until May 06 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Mobile County in southwestern Alabama... Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... Western Escambia County in northwestern Florida... * Until 415 AM CDT. * At 335 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Axis to 4 miles northeast of Downtown Mobile to 7 miles east of Theodore to 3 miles south of Alabama Port, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Daphne, Fairhope, Gulf Shores, Bay Minette, Foley, Orange Beach, Spanish Fort, Robertsdale, Creola, Point Clear, Dauphin Island, Loxley, Lillian, Magnolia Springs, Stapleton, Bon Secour, Axis, Summerdale, Silverhill and Perdido Beach. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
